description: Perfect power transfer and phenomenal fit. These shoes are performance-primed for group rides, crits, or your next fondo. Built on a stiff carbon midsole, they efficiently transfer power through each stroke, and dampen vibrations from the road, so your feet won't feel like they're on fire. The glove-like wrap design means no pressure points, less material and reduced weight.Mesh and TPU upper in a wrapping design is low profile and eliminates pressure points.Nylon midsole reinforced with carbon fibre absorbs vibration and provides stiff pedalling platform.Boa® Fit System closure with Velcro® toe strap holds your foot evenly and securely.Compatible with 3-bolt cleats with expanded cleat adjustment.Polyurethane outsole grips on pavement.Adjustable cup insole.
name: Shimano RC5 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
